    CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `stationary` (
      `id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
      `title` varchar(128) NOT NULL,
      PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
    ) ENGINE=InnoDB  DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1 AUTO_INCREMENT=6 ;

    INSERT INTO `stationary` (`id`, `title`) VALUES
    (1, 'Ruler'),
    (2, 'Pencil'),
    (3, 'Pen'),
    (4, 'Rubber'),
    (5, 'Sharpener');
